tasks.label: C++: Build Debug and Run (g++)
tasks.command: g++ -c src/*.cpp -std=c++14 -g -Wall -m64 -I include -I C:/SDL2-w64/include && g++ *.o -o bin/debug/main -L C:/SDL2-w64/lib -lmingw32 -lSDL2main -lSDL2 -lSDL2_image -lSDL2_ttf -lSDL2_mixer && start bin/debug/main

tasks.label: C++: Build Release (g++)
tasks.command: g++ -c src/*.cpp -std=c++14 -O3 -Wall -m64 -I include -I C:/SDL2-w64/include && g++ *.o -o bin/release/main -s -L C:/SDL2-w64/lib -lmingw32 -lSDL2main -lSDL2 -lSDL2_image -lSDL2_ttf -lSDL2_mixer && start bin/release/main
